title: Raspberry plate, posset, raspberry and vanilla condé with rhubarb and lime syrup
description: Condé is a fancy name for rice pudding with fruit: here it comes raspberry-flavoured and served with a medley of other desserts. Pick and choose your favourite elements if you don’t feel like making the whole thing.
ingredients: ¼ leaf gelatine, soaked in water
½ leaf gelatine, soaked in a bowl of water
